name: The APO App
tagline: Community service assistant for Alpha Phi Omega's Delta Zeta Chapter.
body:
#  APO - Delta Zeta
This Android/iOS app interfaces with our chapter's Google Calendars and multiple Google spreadsheets as a native mobile interface for service project signup, event viewing, directories, and the reporting forms we use to run our membership infrastructure.

## Download
[![Get it on Google Play](http://developer.android.com/images/brand/en_generic_rgb_wo_45.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.upennapo.app) 
[![Get it on the App Store](https://linkmaker.itunes.apple.com/htmlResources/assets/en_us//images/web/linkmaker/badge_appstore-lrg.svg)](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/apo-dz/id862246150?mt=8&uo=4)

The source code is available here on GitHub.
* [Android](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android)
* [iOS](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-iOS)

## Support or Contact
Please report any bugs or feature recommendations to the [App Suggestion Box](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1TvicaFVBNcVgoZbTqXt3YvzY_ds2L0qHhz2LDpi6wDQ/viewform).

Contact us at developer@upennapo.org with any other questions or concerns. We are especially happy to help brothers from other chapters set up the infrastructure they need to produce similar apps. More information on building your own version can be found in the [app wiki](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android/wiki).

## Authors and Contributors
### Authors
Ronald Martin (@ronaldsmartin) and Dean Wilhelmi (@turniphead) originally conceived of and failed to build an "APbrO" Android app at [Pennapps Spring 2013](http://2013f.pennapps.com/) to leverage the existing APO database. One semester and [one iPhone app later](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-iOS), the [original, highly hacky version](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-Android/releases/tag/v0.1) of this app was born during the weekend of [PennApps Fall 2014](http://2014s.pennapps.com/).

Nikila Dandapani (@nikilad) has been a contributor to graphic design since February 2014.

### Dependencies
#### Android
* [Google GSON](https://code.google.com/p/google-gson/) for JSON object de/serialization

#### iOS
* [Facebook SDK](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/ios/)
* [Tab Icons by Iconbeast](http://www.iconbeast.com/)

### Other Contributors
* Daniela Lissandrello (@danielarose) - help with Photoshop
* Han Loh (@lianhanloh) - built Android contact functionality for v0.1 during PennApps
* Tiff Lu - created [original app icon](https://github.com/ronaldsmartin/APO-DZ-iOS/blob/master/APO-DZ/Images.xcassets/AppIcon.appiconset/Icon-60%402x.png)
* Jackie Chow - architecture consultation and support
* Kelly Ca - head of iOS version beta testers

### Our Chapter
The Delta Zeta chapter is based at the University of Pennsylvania. Please visit [our website](upennapo.org) for more information.

## Privacy
### Android
None of your personal information leaves your phone. Ever.

### iOS
Your Facebook account is used only to populate brother photos in the directory details.

### Permissions
* INTERNET - used to pull brother status, calendar, and directory data from the APO Google cloud.
* WIFI - used to check if you're connected to the internet.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
